attributes.action: Provide the same level of antenatal care to all women regardless of where they live in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Depending where you live in the UK determines what level of antenatal care a woman will receive whilst she is pregnant, for an increasing number of women this means only receiving the 20 week anomaly scan. We believe that all women should receive, as part of their basic NHS antenatal care, scans at 12 and 20 weeks alongside any screening tests that her care team feel necessary. 

Please provide a uniform level of care throughout the country rather than running a post code lottery and leaving thousands of women worrying unnecessarily each year.
